WbemEnumerator will enumerate the result of a query from [WbemServices]. Its two methods take no parameters and return false on failure.

==Methods==
|| *Name* || *Description* ||
|| Next || Advances the enumerator to the next result and returns it as a [WbemClass] object or false on failure. ||
|| Reset || Resets the enumerator to the beginning of the results. Returns true on success. ||
